text:
Highly recommendable/excellent stay (4 nights & 5 days) 

First time staying in this hotel and our experience was pleasant. If you’re looking for a basic, decent, great, clean, comfortable and brand-new hotel to stay, this is the best address. 

Location - decent superb location, great ocean view, near to Batam ferry terminal, best malls to explore and a national park in all walking distance. 

Cleanliness - hotel environment is clean & tidy. Quite & relaxing lobby with a great welcoming smell, striking the well-polished floor, a leather sofa seats to enjoy.  The room is very clean with an open concept. Decent and basic needs amenities are set up. On-call items are available if it’s not inside your room. 

Facilities 
 - a restaurant that caters all-day dining. Breakfast on buffet serving which serves mostly local delicacies. If you are looking for western foods, it’s very limited however if you want to experience Indonesian culture & cuisine, you will appreciate the buffet spread. The ocean view is very relaxing & superb when you’re having breakfast in their terrace corner. Lunch & dinner are ala carte. We had dinner and the ox tail soupis highly recommendable based on my experience. Very tasteful, and extraordinarily delicious. 

- gym - simple for body conditioning 
- Pool - business basic class 

Hospitality overall experience 
- management to the staff - superb kindness, humblest polite attitude, warmest thoughtful service. Touching experience throughout from arrival, warm greetings from a doorman same with the reception upon check-in, Stay and check-out. 
- Memorable great touch points from Jeffrey (FOM), Ega (FO Receptionist) Ariel (F&B Manager), Kun & Obez (F&B Supervisor) & Herry (EH). Their politeness is beyond.

Jeffrey, Ariel & Herry, thank you very much for the smooth departure arrangement, it was an over all superb experience. See you again on our future stay.
title: The best hotel in its category - mid-range hotel / Business Hotel
